trans-unit.source: In this section, you'll write a Windows console app that sends events to your Event Hub.
trans-unit.target: In this section, you'll write a Windows console app that sends events to your Event Hub.

trans-unit.source: In Visual Studio, create a new Visual C# Desktop App project using the **Console Application** project template.
trans-unit.target: In Visual Studio, create a new Visual C# Desktop App project using the **Console Application** project template.

trans-unit.source: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, and then click **Manage NuGet Packages for Solution**.
trans-unit.target: In Solution Explorer, right-click the solution, and then click **Manage NuGet Packages for Solution**.

trans-unit.source: Click the **Browse** tab, then search for `Microsoft Azure Service Bus`.
trans-unit.target: Click the **Browse** tab, then search for `Microsoft Azure Service Bus`.

trans-unit.source: Ensure that the project name (**Sender**) is specified in the **Version(s)** box.
trans-unit.target: Ensure that the project name (**Sender**) is specified in the **Version(s)** box.

trans-unit.source: Click **Install**, and accept the terms of use.
trans-unit.target: Click **Install**, and accept the terms of use.

trans-unit.source: Visual Studio downloads, installs, and adds a reference to the [Azure Service Bus library NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/WindowsAzure.ServiceBus).
trans-unit.target: Visual Studio downloads, installs, and adds a reference to the [Azure Service Bus library NuGet package](https://www.nuget.org/packages/WindowsAzure.ServiceBus).

trans-unit.source: Add the following `using` statements at the top of the **Program.cs** file:
trans-unit.target: Add the following `using` statements at the top of the **Program.cs** file:

trans-unit.source: Add the following fields to the **Program** class, substituting the placeholder values with the name of the Event Hub you created in the previous section, and the namespace-level connection string you saved previously.
trans-unit.target: Add the following fields to the **Program** class, substituting the placeholder values with the name of the Event Hub you created in the previous section, and the namespace-level connection string you saved previously.

trans-unit.source: Add the following method to the **Program** class:
trans-unit.target: Add the following method to the **Program** class:

trans-unit.source: This method continuously sends events to your Event Hub with a 200-ms delay.
trans-unit.target: This method continuously sends events to your Event Hub with a 200-ms delay.
